content.detailedDescription:
during yesterday's eclipse i was trying to take pictures to show my students. i was not successful in pointing my camera directly at the sun because there were clouds in the way.  so i decided to see if i could find another way to record the event.  no luck. so i gave up. a few minutes later i decided to run an errand and as i was going  to my car i noticed that i could see the eclipse in the reflection of the glass windows of my vehicle. i took out my phone and snapped some pictures using the window as a filter. ( there were no lights on inside my car and i angled the camera so my reflection wasn't in it). when i was reviewing the pictures later on, i noticed pretty clear images of a ufo in each of them.
i was really excited to see what i had captured!! i believe we are not alone and this solidifies  my belief!
content.summary: Took these photos during the partial eclipse. since i could see when i pointed my camera directly into the sun, i used the reflection from my car window glass.

content.detailedDescription:
Both myself and someone else, iin different places in the city took pictures and got the same results.  it looks to be something you'd see a nasa as a rocket is far up in space.  we were taking pictures of the eclipse.  in nh. we only had about 60% coverage of the moon.  when downloading our many photos, that is when we saw this rocket like thing going horizontal off the lower middle of the moon. we wouldn't have seen it with the naked eye.  we both stopped taking pictures when the moon was in the middle of the sun so i cannot answer "when i lost sight of the object".  feelings are my husband isn't really into these things.  my my feelings come from media i've seen that it could be any countries rocket.  but this thing as out as far as the moon.  i have never sent anything to your kind or agency or anyones.  i would really like to find out what it was.  one photo is below:
thank you.
and please do not use my name and address in any media form.
content.summary: During the eclipse i used the camera on tripod and after viewing them on computer you could make out a rocket like thing going straight right of moon

content.detailedDescription: Taking photos of the eclipse around 2:10 pm and noticed this in one, had to zoom in on the picture, no idea what this is.
content.summary: Taking photos of the eclipse and noticed this when revewing them.

content.detailedDescription: We were in our backyard pool waiting for the eclipse. no stars or planes or anything else in the sky. we then got dressed to go out front door to eclipse festival and there was a reflective triangular object in the sky stationary but then it moved . then moments after staring at it and searching the sky for for more, another appeared. i photo them both with my phone. i filmed them during before and after totality of the eclipse. then, poof, they were gone. the fish at the creek were stunned, and staring up at the sky just above water level the entire day and wouldn't eat any bait.
content.summary: There were 2. the second appeared after the eclipse was closer to totality with no other stars in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my porch, facing west,around 7 pm talking on the phone.
since i was faced west the blue sky's were in front of me. the sun was setting and with a fluffy cloud blocking the sunset it created a light blue background above it that stood out.
suddenly i seen 2 objects just drop straight down in the sky extremely high in the sky. it looked like firework falling from the sky only color was white lights, they were side by side and looked like big white cotton balls.
immediately as it dropped i seen it and told my daughter on the phone i just seen something fall from the sky.
one disappeared quickly but the other didn't didn't disappear. it just stayed stationary, like a floating cotton ball. it was there for several minutes. i stopped a neighbor power walking to point it out to her.
after a few minutes the fluffy white object then disappeared 
about 5 minutes or so i seen 5 planes coming through the sky going different directions
what i seen was above any plane, there were no planes when this fell, and it fell like tear drops or fireworks, color did not change was white and because of the sunset lighting up blue sky's i seen it very clearly
i did not have my ipad to take pictures 
but went and got it took pictures of the many planes after the sighting. the picture then had more clouds in the sky than when i witness it
so no actual picture of what i seen fall just pictures afterwords when i seen all the planes. the 5 different planes were going fast, chris crossing,  dropping either chem trails or fuel,  making crosses and squares in the sky
content.summary: Dropped down from the sky in a straight line, dropping as fireworks do. way above clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking photos of the solar eclipse with my camera on a tripod and looked up to see a jet weaving around and spraying a chemtrail.  i took out my phone and snapped a photo of the jet and didn't think of it after that.  i went inside and looked at it and there was the object i thought was a star.  i zoomed it in and it didn't look like a star at all.  i never observed the object with my eyes nor did i see it in the viewfinder.  i saw it only after i was going through the photos on my phone.

  i would have noticed the very bright light before i took the photo but it was not there, nor was it there after i took the photo.

  just to the right of the object is also a black spot that was not visible in the sky but it showed up on the photo.
content.summary: Object above chemtrail at solar eclipse

content.detailedDescription: We are traveling down us 23 and twice now one to our left right before delaware traveling south a bright planet looking light appears. me andy wife both see it. it is orange and flash really bright and dissapears. the same thing happens to the right of us traveling down us 71 to our right. these are not stars and planets. there here a few seconds then disapear.
content.summary: Us 23 south right before delaware bright balls

content.detailedDescription:
We lived against the one side of table mountain on the slopes of devil’s peak mountain just outside the cape town city bowl area.

my ex-wife and myself were busy working in the garden and our property normally allowed us the most amazing sunsets between the table mountain and lion’s head towards camps bay.

that evening it was totally clear with no clouds and we enjoyed the last of the sun’s rays as the sun set...... and once the sun was gone, we were just finishing off when i glanced towards the direction between the mountains. there was still some after-glow from the sun – but what really intrigued me was this very bright disc or orb floating quite some distance out to sea. at first i thought it might be a large balloon reflecting the sun...But the sun had dropped way below the horizon already.

the orb seemed multicoloured but somehow moving and because of the distance, i thought it was my eyes that were merely playing tricks on me....So i ran into the house and got my binoculars.

viewing the orb was through the glasses was even more amazing – but it was totally weird. the only way to explain what i saw was that it appeared to consist of constantly moving molten light with constantly merging and changing rainbow colours. the colours seemed to flow into each other and simultaneously spin or rotate inside the orb. it was stunning and mesmerizing and not an item i’d ever seen before.

with the binoculars it was quite large and i scanned the area around the object but could not see any other flying object or aircraft that could perhaps have this item hanging from it.

the orb remained for more than 5 minutes and i even called the local newspaper – the argus and reported the sighting to the duty journalist, but he was not really interested and said they’d investigate...

a few seconds later the orb moved slightly to the right and then suddenly sped off in a steep angle in a northerly direction and disappeared. the speed and acceleration led me to believe that it was not a normal aircraft....Firstly none of south africa’s fighter jets could hover and then move that way and although we did have an amazing attack helicopter – the rooivalk that was developed in the 80’s – there was no way it would have been able to move across the sky at that speed....

excited we told some of our friends and soon realised they were very dubious about our claims. family members also just laughed and soon my ex-wife also preferred denying it had happened.

the sighting has been on my mind for years and unfortunately i cannot deny what i saw that evening.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Brightly coloured orb/disc hovering then moving off at high speed

content.detailedDescription: I am the same person who sent in photos of 7-27 and 8-18 incidents in wichita falls, texas. i was at work again and in a building when i saw it. i began looking outside a window after 730pm. right before 8pm, i saw a bright white object beside a cloud, which looked like one of the ones photographed on 8-18, over a bigger cloud formation. i ran outside, took 2 photos and then switched my phone to video mode. i captured a little over 3 minutes of video, making a commentary a couple times. i must apologize beforehand for the quality of video, but was holding the phone bare handed with nothing to stabilize it on. as i took video, the object remained stationary and seemed to "hide" itself beside a cloud. i would have taken more video, but had to go back to work.  when i did get a chance to review the clip, i saw various colors coming from what seemed to be a "typical" disc shaped object: red, yellow and greenish. i was like "this is for real" and very excited. admittedly disappointed i couldn't hold phone more still, but saying to myself "this is the third time you have caught something in less than a month...Unbelievable !!!"
content.summary: I saw an object in the air as i did 7-27 and 8-18

content.detailedDescription: Was at a park saw something flashing wasn't like the planes near it or moving like them blink on and off move slowly lost sighting after stopped blinking for a couple minutes on going
content.summary: Star like glowing

content.detailedDescription: On august 21 2017, while outside before the 99.5% eclipse, my husband and myself took pictures with our cell phones of the sun.  trying to view the eclipse.  while we were taking pictures, we saw nothing out of the ordinary.  bit, afterwards, we were looking at the pics, and saw a planet looking sphere in almost every photo.  but what really captured our attention, was the saucer looking craft that was flying towards the object.  after looking closely at the planet looking sphere in almost all the photos, it had changed positions.
content.summary: Planet looking in sky, changed direction.  followed by a circular craft.  25 minuted around  99.5% eclipse

content.detailedDescription: When  viewing digital pictures from solar eclipse 2017 taken with cell phone camera an object was spotted. several pictures using basic filters attached. note the 3 dark areas under the object. also the slight tilt typical of ufos. this area is approx 3 miles east of i35 north and parvin road in kansas city mo. we are reviewing recordings from dv tape cam corder to see if object is visible. one thing is for sure. there is something reflecting the sun in a big way.
content.summary: Object in sky under solar eclipse

content.detailedDescription: I made my bed at 12:30 pm,i have a purple velveteen bedspread and i threw it on top and smoothed it all down,not any marks on it,after making it and finished,i walked to look out my window, and upon leaving my bedroom, i was in shock as i witnessed this footprint on my bedspread so bold,it was very small about 5 1/2 inches long,looks like three toes to me. i have had happenings in the past with ufo sightings,and abduction experiences.
content.summary: I was making my bed and put my velveteen bedspread on top,i then smoothed it all down,when i turned around this footprint was boldly on it.

content.detailedDescription: myself and two other witnesses were out side. there were various planes about at lower altitudes. while i was looking at a low flying plan ...In my perifreal vision i caught what appeared to be a camera flash just above my head. i stopped looked up and watched for it again....I witnessed a white to yellow white  flasg above my head at 90 degrees. it was about the size of an aspirin above my head and there were no clouds directly above my head stars can clearly be seen. the flash was random and did not have any certain sequence. at times it would flash several times and there may be a delay of about  10 to 15 seconds. the flashes are much brighter than an aircraft stroke.Sometimes instead of a flash it would fade in and fade out with no flash. the object hovered above us for approximately two or three minutes flashing in the same spot directly overhead. the object then moved towards the  east at a slow pace. no sound was heard from said object. the object continued east ward until disappearing over the horizon. the flashes would either be a flash or a fade but not following any preset patterns such as an aircraft light and no other colors were seeing other than white and yellow white dim.    upon turning back to the east and looking up again we witnessed another light. this one appeared to be at a higher altitude and was a blue and red light. smaller than the one previously witnessed. this light was an approximately 75° above head and was moving slowly   to the southeast. we watched this light for approximately two minutes and then caught yet another light. the next light was in the east at approximately 60° was a blue to blue white color approximately the size and appearance of a star but this light moved to the south east rather quickly.  there were aircraft about flying out lower altitudes however this light appeared to be at an extremely high altitude as it appeared to be a star but was moving at a very rapid speed. the transit from east to south east out of sight was approximately 10 seconds.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 random lights

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out on the patio watching the eclipse (8 /21/2017). i had brought my camera outside to take photos of the images that we were getting of the eclipse in our little shoe box viewer. i decided that i would try to take a photo of the actual eclipse with my camera without looking into the screen. so at the time when the eclipse was at it's peak, i put my camera on my left shoulder and snapped a few pictures. we then went into the house and i downloaded the pics to my pc. i was shocked by what was on the pictures...I don't know what it is, i am not saying that it is a ufo, but it is something...It almost looks fake. i swear that i have not cg'ed this photo...I thought that it was interesting and that you could help me figure out what it is.
content.summary: Picture i took over shoulder during the eclipse. saw this image on photo.

content.detailedDescription: Outside at 1148am during total solar eclipse.  took this picture facing south toward scottsbluff national monument while moon was completely covering the sun.  nothing was seen in sky with naked eye or through camera viewfinder.  photo shows three dark unidentified objects in formation above the city.  my first thought was that these were probably birds, but the objects seem to be at a distance that would be too far to be birds, and no birds were seen in the sky during photo.  did not notice objects until looking through photos later in the day.  none of the objects seems to look exactly the same.  one is long and bullet shaped and the other two have hazy edges.
content.summary: Three ufo seen in photograph taken during total solar eclipse not visible with naked eye

content.detailedDescription: Doing the ufo august 21st in north county of st louis missouri. i decided to take a picture of the solar eclipse to see what type of results i could  get with my cell phone. once i review my photo this is the image that i saw. i did have my flash on my camera and to naked eyes i didn't see anything in the tree.
content.summary: I was observing the solar eclipse i decided to take a picture of it with my cell phone even though they said it wouldn't work. once i looked at my picture this is what i saw at the top of the tree.

content.detailedDescription:
Incident occurred during the partial eclipse here in dc, toward the end and just before the clouds rolled in. 

a friend and i had been watching the eclipse in rock creek park

i (naked eye) spotted a small, circular, bright white object in the sky that looked like it could be a planet, but i've seen these or similar objects before in dc and knew i was seeing the same phenomenon again. the object appeared at first to be hovering, but eventually i realized it was moving slowly westward. 

fortunately i had my binoculars with me. with my binoculars i see the object, a brilliant white sphere, clearly emit a smaller, highly luminescent object, but that light appeared to then re-enter the white sphere. thirty seconds to a minute later the sphere emitted another tiny, glowing light/object, and that one too appeared to re-enter the white sphere. approximately a minute later, while i was looking through the binoculars, the sphere abruptly shrank down to a tiny point of light similar to the small objects emitted earlier (my friend observing naked-eye had thought it completely disappeared), and there appeared to be ghostly concentric circles (at least two) barely visible around the point of light. the entire structure including the translucent circles was larger than the original size of the white sphere- perhaps 3-4 times the diameter.

less than 30 seconds later, the object was covered by the incoming storm clouds and we didn't see it again.

this was a very exciting experience for both of us!
content.summary: White sphere above washington dc emits two small lights/objects, then partially dematerializes

content.detailedDescription: Grey object bottom left-hand corner of picture
content.summary: This photo was taken during the eclipse today

content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.summary: I was simply watching morning news i saw the flash and i knew it was a ufo so i played it back took photos and  this is the second on upward ascent  to high for frizzbee

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping at my home and was awakened by my dog barking and howling at 4:50 am. i went downstairs to check on the dog, as she had never done this before. i let her out and while waiting, started looking in the sky. i noticed a light that looked like a flickering star. it was moving erratically in all directions, looking very odd. i starting filming the light with my phone and got around 3 minutes of video. i don't remember why i stopped, however i did transition to a ship going by on the river. maybe i lost interest, as i didn't really think much about it at the time. i grabbed my camera and took a series of pictures, 3 of them were of the light in the sky. the 1st and 3rd were with the flash off, and pic 2 had the flash. the photos were all taken within a 10 second span. 
i went to bed, mentioned to my girlfriend that i that i saw a ufo. 
considering that i didn't put much stock in my sighting, i didn't review the pics/video until the next day. 
when i zoomed in and looked at the video, i was shocked at the movement of the light/object. it is morphing and changing shapes, many seem to be cubed. there are many geometric shapes formed, and many holes that appear to be darker than the sky itself. 
in the photos, the brightest object is the item i was videoing. i didn't realize at the time that there were other lights/objects. in the first photo, it is the bright light and 4 or 5 other lights. there are tracers from each, from camera movement-we debunked that as nothing. however, the lights themselves are there. picture 2 only shows the main light, the flash must have effected the picture, the other lights are not visible. picture 3 shows what appear to be some sort of craft. initially viewing the picture i saw what appeared to be 4 or 5 objects, however there are close to 20-30. 
video was shot with a smart phone, pics digital camera 200 mm lens.
content.summary: Noticed flickering star like light, moving eratically,started filiming for 3 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was recording the eclipse around 2:40pm -3:10pm with my camera phone, when i first thought it was a reflection of the moon or camera glare. it appeared from the right and/or downward and was hovering,  circling around the sun.The body appeared green and the beam blue,  almost like an echo symbol. it changed shapes from a saturn looking object to a dot,  when it quickly accelerated, while investigating an actual plane which flew close by. that was after the ufo was already in the sky. because of the quick change of direction to investigate the airplane, am i wondering, if this is not a glare, but a ufo? i'm not sure, if i attached the correct video. but i have quite a few more from that incident.
content.summary: I got a video. it appears an ufo appeared with the solar eclipse. i thought it might be a camera glare. but then,  there was an actual airplane flying close by. and the "glare" seemed to investigate it. it behaved strangely for a glare.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on the phone talking in our family room at about 8:30 or so on august 20, when i glanced at the kitchen window, which overlooks the eastern hills toward brentwood, ca. i saw a bright red glowing object hovering over the hills and initially thought it was an airplane or radio beacon, but the object suddenly grew larger and then disappeared. then a split second later, it reappeared in an entirely different location in the sky. this happened several times. i then walked over to the window to get a closer look and told my husband that i thought i was seeing a ufo. he laughed (he was still on the phone talking to our daughter) but he came over to look.  after a minute or so, he agreed that the thing was indeed a ufo--we continued to watch, and it moved erratically moving several times in a left to right direction. at one point, it turned a glowing white and seemed to pulse, almost like it was sending out a signal. my husband and i went outside our home to watch the object more closely. it descended and ascended at least 3 times, and appeared and disappeared many more times than that. our neighbor saw us outside and we called him over to see the ufo, but by the time he crossed the street, the object had disappeared completely. the whole episode took about 10 minutes, and i wish i'd had the presence of mind to take a video of it with my phone, but i was mesmerized just watching. it was a very strange experience, quite unnerving, and i had the feeling that whatever it was that we had seen was aware that we were watching. my husband and i later turned on the news and searched the internet, but there was no mention of this thing. i also felt that although the ufo was no longer visible, it might possibly still be in the area. just a spooky feeling. i wonder if there's a connection between the lunar eclipse, which took place today, and the object's presence last night. i really wish i knew, and i wonder if anyone else saw what we saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighted round, red object hovering over the hills of brentwood, ca. at around 8 p.M.On august 20,2017.It disappeared, then reappeared, a fraction of a second later, in a different place.It hovered, descended,ascended,& changed to glowing white. it pulsed.

content.detailedDescription:
Sleeping and woke up around 3:15am. at 11:30am i reviewed the cctv security camera to verify if low motion detection setting recorded activity from the night sky. from the timeline there were 3 video events recorded from the night. at 2:15am-2:21am pdt there was a bright flash of light making night into day.  the video recording of the flash of light could be inaccurate from the ccd sensor overexposing the bright flash of light from the sky.  if there was a noise beyond 80db i should have heard it. the camera would have showed an alert on the timeline. the houses became clearly visible in great detail from the intensity of light from the sky. it seems unlikely that the intensity of a flare from the sky or a transformer created the bright light. if it were lightning from the clouds the video of entire sky from darkness to daylight should not appear that intense.

my thoughts.  the light may have been off the coast of the pacific ocean or within the san francisco bay.  i wondered if it may be similar to the shag  harbour incident of nova scotia.

the flash of light happened for a duration of 1 second or 1.5 seconds.
content.summary: Bright flash of light brighter than the sun.  the light from the sky made night into day.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures during the solar eclipse i happen to look just pasted the sun an i saw an orb of some kind that just disappeared once i went to take another picture.
content.summary: I was taking pictures during the solar eclipse i happen to look just pasted the sun an i saw an orb of some kind that just disappeared once i went to take another picture.

content.detailedDescription: It was the night where you could see mars pretty clear. my boyfriend and i went outside in my backyard to see the view. as we were talking we noticed that multiple military aircraft were flying pretty low past us. what freaked us out was that we never saw military planes in our town before so something must be up. it looked like they were traveling towards new york so we looked on the news to see if anything happened, but nothing was there. when i looked up into the sky i noticed something weird. i go to him "babe look at that. doesn't it look like a giant ufo hiding in like something mode or invisibility?" he agreed and we both soon felt an  eerie feeling and we decided to leave and go back to his house. we were driving down the street when i saw it. i was looking out of the windshield and i saw a floating orb just sitting there. it looked like a fireball, but not. i couldn't see through it. it looked solid and it was glowing orange. we got out of the car and we were just in awe. it was floating and moving around. it seemed like i could just get on my boyfriend's shoulders and i could of grabbed it. i told my boyfriend to take a video, but he sucks at taking them so you couldn't see, then again i haven't looked at the video in a long time. i would have to look for it in his phone. the orb then started to flying steadily away until i lost it. i love aliens and everything surrounding them. it was really a special moment for me. i hope i get to see some more again.
content.summary: It looked like a floating fireball.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard snapping pictures of the sky during the solar eclipse. i didn't notice the object until i went back to review the pictures a few minutes after i took picture. when i first saw the dot on the picture i thought maybe it was a bird because of the color then i zoomed in on it. when i seen the up close picture at first i was a little scared then excited at the fact that i may have caught a ufo in a picture. i showed all my kids and they agreed that it's a ufo.
content.summary: I was snapping pictures of the sky during the solar eclipse and when i reviewed the pictures this is what i found.

content.detailedDescription:
I had stepped outside to walk my dog just before we planned on going to bed.  when i was about 30-40 yards west of the two-story building behind me, i turned eastward and saw a glowing white light with blue aura within my line of sight, over the building.  i stopped in place and watched it, using lines on the building as a point of reference ensuring the object was indeed moving very slowly, southward... not a trick of the eye caused by nearby clouds.  there was no sound, no port/starboard or fore/aft lights.  having worked around helicopters, i'd guess it to be approximately the size of a commercial version yet certainly not a helicopter. i lost view of the orb when obstructed by a patch of clouds, so we left the scene and continued our walk. 

usually, my cell phone is on me but wasn't that night.  had i taken an image of the orb, the resolution wouldn't have been enough quality to show more than a white, round fuzz.

i spoke with neighbors and learned i'm not the only one who saw this and felt it was quite strange.  also, that night plus the next, my dog wouldn't leave my bed and was on alert (sometimes growling) as she stared towards the bedroom window facing the side where the orb had hovered.
content.summary: White orb with blue aura seen slowly moving southward, low altitude

content.detailedDescription: Eclipse eugene, oregon @ 10:12am was taking place.  1st witness pointed out to me a strange dark 'thing' that was drifting by.  i had dslr in hand, but with polarized lens filter on for direct sunlight.  i was able to snap a few shots.  the levels can be adjusted. during the eclipse, dogs were heard barking, and the air seemed very still with a pink hue to everything.  i was also using a camcorder to capture the event.  a 1st witness that was watching the event as well and had called out to me regarding a dark 'thing' that was drifting by.  i saw a dark object drifting by at an even steady rate, about line of sight to some close tree tops.  i would say, at about 30-45 degrees up facing to the east.  the object was very dark and hard to make out as it drifted by, and with the eclipse in progress, the lighting was dim with a pink hue, since eugene, or was not in the 'zone' for totality.  i had my dslr ready, and remembered that all the settings were for the direct sunlight and i was using a polarized lens filter.  i had to quickly make adjustments for exposure for non-direct sunlight.  i was only able to photograph 7 images before the object was 'lost' behind a large nearby pine tree, and the focus was sketchy.    i had opened the jpeg files of the object from the nef raw conversion and adjusted the levels.  i was able to bring out further detail with those adjustments.  what you get are the converted jpeg images uploaded, no adjustments.  you will have to make adjustments to bring out detail.
content.summary: Eclipse eugene, oregon @ 10:12am was taking place.  1st witness pointed out strange dark 'thing' drifting by.  i had dslr in hand, but with polarized lens filter on for direct sunlight.  i was able to snap a few shots.  the levels can be adjusted.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I never actually saw it in person but i was at my dads house in the back yard and i set up my camera to get a video of the eclipse, later when i went through all the videos i recorded i noticed an object that appeared and dissapered within 3 frames. i watched it over and over again confused and trying to convince myself it was a bird. it didn't make sence to be a bird because it was just a flash and then gone, if it was a bird i would have been able to see it move but it didn't, and a video before that proves it being a bird wrong. the other video has a fly going by and it's a time laps which means it's really fast, flys are already fast on there own and some how when it was sped up even more i could still see it move frame by frame. so what ever this object is, it didn't land, it didn't move, and it wasn't there for long.
content.summary: I took a vid during the eclipse and watch it again and for a split second a ufo appeared. vid and pic proof
